product_name: Lezyne Zecto Drive Rear Bike Light
long_description: Delivering a highly visible 20 lumens in daytime flash mode, the Lezyne Zecto Drive Rear Bike Light uses a versatile clip to mount anywhere and a USB-rechargable battery for post-ride convenience. 3 bright LEDs offer 2 hr. 45 min. runtime on high and a 7 hr. runtime on flashing. Check the Power Indicator for remaining battery life; recharge using the integrated USB cable. Lezyne Zecto Drive Rear Bike Light is designed to ensure light is directed straight back for maximum visibility. Light also emits through the side to further enhance visibilty.
short_description: Delivering a highly visible 20 lumens in daytime flash mode, the Lezyne Zecto Drive Rear Bike Light uses a versatile clip to mount anywhere and a USB-rechargable battery for post-ride convenience.
